SA10bsa012_u:4: Pshk_2 ādyāṣṭamanavamāḥ syuḥ kleśāḥ karma dvitīyadaśamau ca /
SA10bsa012_u:5: śeṣāḥ sapta ca duḥkhaṃ trisaṅgrahā dvādaśa tu dharmāḥ //
SA10bsa012_u:6: Pshk_3 tribhyo bhavati dvandvaṃ dvandvātprabhavanti sapta saptabhyaḥ /
SA10bsa012_u:8: Pshk_4 hetuphalañca[hi]sarvaṃ jagadanyo nāsti kaścidiha sattvaḥ /
SA10bsa012_u:9: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ //
SA10bsa012_u:14: Pshk_7 nāpaneyamataḥ kiñcit prakṣepyaṃ nāpi kiñcana /
